hero.heading: Skills
description: Throughout my career as a full stack engineer, I have gained extensive experience across a wide array of tools and technologies.
This page provides an in-depth look at the core skills I have mastered, from frontend frameworks like React and Vue to backend technologies like Node.js, Django, and cloud platforms.
